title: Luxury 3 Bedroom Apartment @ Iceland Residencies for Sale
details:
We have a luxury, spacious 3 bedroom large apartment for sale @ Iceland Residencies.The apartment located on a higher floor(above the 25th) with panoramic sea and lake views comes with wooden flooring, 3 spacious bedrooms with attached bathrooms, powder room, living,sitting and dining areas,pantry,maids quarters and 2 reserve parking slots.

The apartment was leased for USD 3,500/- to Embassy Officials and it has a floor area of 2030Sqft.

Presently the apartments comes fully furnished with high-end furniture but the price quoted for an UNFURNISHED apartment.

Quoted Selling Price :- LKR 112.50 Million

NO BROKERS/AGENTS PLEASE
